item.title: How To Change The Theme of A Hugo Blog
item.description:
A few days ago I migrated this blog to Hugo from Jekyll and employed a beautiful theme called Even, a concise and powerful hugo theme, which fascinated me so much until I came across another graceful and exquisite hugo theme called Tranquilpeak, brought by Thibaud Lepretre from the original hexo theme.

So I decided to change the theme of this blog and I took the following steps to accomplished that, which was very easy and worth a share here.
